channel.title: Who's going to MicroConf Europe?
channel.description:
There seems to be a few of us going to MicroConf (@patio11, @ian, @Andy, @chriskottom, @kulmala, @dennis, and @jarkko - anyone else?)
When's everyone getting in? My flight arrives Friday at 5.40pm, so not sure what time that'll get me to the hotel. Anyone arriving at around the same time, want to share a vehicle of some sort?
Depending on when people are arriving, it'd be great to organise a bootstrapped meetup (thanks @dennis for the idea!)

item.title: Who's going to MicroConf Europe?
item.dc:creator: jskn
item.description:
I’m going! And really looking forward to it!

Read full topic

item.title: Who's going to MicroConf Europe?
item.dc:creator: itengelhardt
item.description:
Hey folks,

I am sorry to disappoint you, but we’ll have to close the registration for the inofficial dinner.
We have grown from 56 to 72 people in just the last 5 days and the restaurant staff is going to have a hard time handling this many people.
Additionally, we can’t get your food pre-orders to the restaurant in time for them to buy & prepare your meal in advance.

I am very sorry to turn you guys down

Cheers,
Christoph

Read full topic

item.title: Who's going to MicroConf Europe?
item.dc:creator: kulmala
item.description:
@davidw You should have an email, let’s hope we’ll still get you in.

I too wish we had more time! It’s just 2 hours from the end of the official program to the party.

Having such a huge group, I wouldn’t be surprised if we would be a little late from the party.

Read full topic

item.title: Who's going to MicroConf Europe?
item.dc:creator: davidw
item.description:
@kulmala here in Italy, a dinner would conflict with - and quite possibly last longer than - something going from 7 to 10, and I’ve become accustomed to things here, thus the confusion

I guess I’d like to sign up if it’s not too late. Thank you!

David Welton, davidw@dedasys.com, davidnwelton on twitter - just me.

Read full topic

item.description:
Hope to get chance to talk with all over the weekend!

item.description:

Looking forward to meeting you all in Prague!

item.title: Who's going to MicroConf Europe?
item.dc:creator: Christopher
item.description:
I need to get out of consulting and get my income from products if I’m ever going to attend anything, ever. I don’t know how anyone in the consulting biz can afford to go to conferences and take the billables hit.

My body is here in the States, but my heart is with you folks in Prague!

Read full topic

item.title: Who's going to MicroConf Europe?
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.description:
@dennis Just checked my flight and I touch down at 3pm local time (I thought it was 2pm). Hopefully I can be in the hotel reception for 4ish. Alternatively I might just head straight from the airport to the city centre. I could always try to find you in the city centre using the mobile.

Read full topic

item.title: Who's going to MicroConf Europe?
item.dc:creator: davidw
item.description:
Hi,

First off, I have to say I’m a bit dismayed I hadn’t found this forum earlier, it looks really cool.

Briefly: I’m from the US, but live in Padua (Padova) Italy, and work on this as my bootstrapped side project: http://www.liberwriter.com - it’s profitable, although not to where I can live off it. It’s also a hybrid service-product, which is not 100% ideal in my eyes, but I’m learning a ton from it and have greatly enjoyed the experience so far.

In any event, I will be at MicroConf Europe, and look forward to meeting everyone there. My flight from Venice arrives at 16:40 if anyone wants to share a ride.

Thanks to @thibaut_barrere for pointing out this forum to me on Hacker News.

Read full topic

item.title: Who's going to MicroConf Europe?

item.description:
I’m going. How many people who were at MicroConf Vegas in May will be there?

item.title: Who's going to MicroConf Europe?
item.dc:creator: chriskottom
item.description:
@andy, @dennis: Yes, given the time change, it’s probably not going to work out. I’ll see you both at the reception, and we can see if there’s a break in the schedule sometime during the weekend.

Read full topic

item.title: Who's going to MicroConf Europe?
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.description:
@chriskottom I would quite like to be at the reception when it starts. Now that has been moved forward to 6:30. Meeting up at 5:30 doesn’t really leave enough time for a walk and getting back to the hotel. Perhaps we can meet at the reception instead and then see about arranging a walk later that evening or over the weekend?

@dennis I will probably head into the city centre from the hotel at 2 or 3pm on the Friday. I will text/phone you to see if you are around then.

Read full topic

item.title: Who's going to MicroConf Europe?
item.dc:creator: kulmala
item.description:
@chriskottom @Andy The welcome gathering is starting already at 18:30, so I think I’ll skip the city walk after all. See you at the conference!

Read full topic

item.title: Who's going to MicroConf Europe?
item.dc:creator: chriskottom
item.description:
Hi everyone,

I’m still a new user in Discourse, so I’m not able to send out private messages, only reply to them. So if you’re interested in joining up for a walk around the city center before the reception and want to get my phone number just in case, please drop me a PM, and I will respond.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.description:
